## serializeFlowContentToHtml() function

Serializes the specified flow content to an HTML string

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function serializeFlowContentToHtml(content: FlowContent, options?: FlowContentHtmlOptions): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  content | [FlowContent](./scribing.flowcontent.md) | The flow content that shall be serialized |
|  options | [FlowContentHtmlOptions](./scribing.flowcontenthtmloptions.md) | _(Optional)_ Optional. HTML serialization options. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;string&gt;

A promise that is resolved with the serialized HTML string
